original_title: Vehicular movement to be limited at Nugegoda railway crossing
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The police say that vehicular movement will be limited at the Nugegoda railway crossing from 8 am today to 6 am tomorrow due to an essential maintenance activity.
The police announced that during the relevant period, the part of the railway crossing at Stanley Thilakaratne Mawatha in Nugegoda, along the Kelani Valley railway line, will be closed.
The police inform the motorists to use alternative routes during this period.
